registries.name: Origin UI (COSS)
registries.details: Valid JSON registry. Tested comp-267 (warning alert component). Uses Lucide icons.
registries.recommendation: Use for direct URL imports. Good for Origin UI components.

registries.name: ShadcnUI Blocks
registries.details: Valid JSON registry. Tested accordion-01 component. Uses ShadcnUI accordion primitives.
registries.recommendation: Good for pre-built accordion blocks and similar components.

registries.name: Kokonut UI
registries.details: Valid registry with 100+ components. Tested action-search-bar. Uses Motion animations, modern React patterns.
registries.recommendation: Excellent for modern UI components with animations. Open source with Pro version.

registries.name: Neobrutalism
registries.details: Valid JSON registry. Tested accordion component. Uses Radix UI, distinctive neobrutalism aesthetic with bold borders/shadows.
registries.recommendation: Great for bold, distinctive UI design. MIT licensed, based on shadcn/ui.

registries.name: Magic UI
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested avatar-circles component. Creates overlapping circular avatar displays with optional additional person count.
registries.recommendation: Good for avatar and profile-related components. Modern design patterns.

registries.name: Cult UI
registries.details: Valid registry (already in our config). Tested neumorph-button. Uses Framer Motion, neumorphic design with soft shadows.
registries.recommendation: Excellent for modern, animated components. Already configured and working in MCP.

registries.name: Kibo UI
registries.details: Valid registry (already in our config). Custom CLI and registry. Extends shadcn/ui with additional components.
registries.recommendation: Great for extended shadcn/ui functionality. Already configured and working.

registries.name: ReUI
registries.details: Valid registry (already in our config). Tested combobox-group. Grouped combobox with country selection, flag emojis, searchable.
registries.recommendation: Great for complex form components and grouped selections. Already configured and working.

registries.name: Retro UI
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested button component. Bold, retro-styled button with multiple variants and sizes.
registries.recommendation: Great for retro/vintage themed projects. Engaging visual design.

registries.name: Skiper UI
registries.details: Domain not found (skiper-ui.dev). Registry may be offline or moved.
registries.recommendation: Skip - registry appears to be offline.

registries.name: Jolly UI
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested grid-list component. Uses React Aria Components with drag/drop and multiple selection.
registries.recommendation: Excellent for accessible, advanced UI patterns. Uses React Aria for a11y.

registries.name: Animate UI
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested components-animate-tabs. Interactive tabs with highlight effects and dark mode support.
registries.recommendation: Great for animated, interactive components. Focus on motion and transitions.

registries.name: AI Elements
registries.details: Uses separate CLI (ai-elements), not shadcn-compatible. For AI-native applications.
registries.recommendation: Use their CLI directly. Not compatible with shadcn registry system.

registries.name: Dice UI
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested input-group component. Flexible input group with horizontal/vertical orientations and accessibility.
registries.recommendation: Good for form components and input grouping. Focus on accessibility.

registries.name: ElevenLabs
registries.details: Uses separate ElevenLabs CLI, not shadcn-compatible. For audio/voice applications.
registries.recommendation: Use their CLI directly. Not compatible with shadcn registry system.

registries.name: Icons Registry
registries.details: Valid registry. Tested activity icon. Animated SVG icons with motion/react and configurable animations.
registries.recommendation: Excellent for animated icons. Custom animation variants and programmatic control.

registries.name: Irsyad UI
registries.details: Domain not found (irsyadadl.com). May be GitHub-based or personal registry.

registries.name: Eldora UI
registries.details: Valid registry! Correct domain is eldoraui.site (not .com). Tested fade-text component with Framer Motion animations.
registries.recommendation: Great for text animations! Domain correction was key.
